sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
Moderatus, the most delectable & famous historie of the blacke knight:[...] Parry, Robert, fl. 1540-1612.
[166] p.
By Richard Ihones, at the signe of the Rose and Crowne, neer to S. Andrewes Church in Holburne, [Imprinted at London : 1595]
Partly in verse. Title from caption on A1r. Signed at end: R.P. Gent., i.e. Robert Parry. Imprint from colophon. Running title reads: The strange aduentures of the blacke knight. Signatures: A-X⁴ (-X4). Imperfect; leaf X3 torn, slightly affecting text. Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
=======
Moderatus, the most delectable & famous historie of the blacke knight:[...] Parry, Robert, fl. 1540-1612.
[166] p.
By Richard Ihones, at the signe of the Rose and Crowne, neer to S. Andrewes Church in Holburne, [Imprinted at London : 1595]
Partly in verse. Title from caption on A1r. Signed at end: R.P. Gent., i.e. Robert Parry. Imprint from colophon. Running title reads: The strange aduentures of the blacke knight. Signatures: A-X⁴ (-X4). Imperfect; leaf X3 torn, slightly affecting text. Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
Richard Ihones
the signe of the Rose
to S. Andrewes Church in Holburne
>>>>>>> imprintparse
